Confirmation.definition: the act or process of confirming

1.definition: the act or process of confirming, assuring, or upholding [seeking of the agreement]the ratification of an executive act by a legislative body [senate of the Supreme Court nominee]

sub_terms.a: an express or implied contract by which a person makes a voidable agreement bindinga definite expression or written memorandum that verifies or substantiates an agreement previously made orally or informally
sub_terms.b: a declaration whereby a person corrects the parts of an obligation that are null to make them enforceable
sub_terms.c: a conveyance by which valid title to an estate is transferred to a person already in possession or by which an estate is increased
